actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 518(a) of the National Housing Act for the purpose of extending the time period during which a homeowner may apply for assistance under such section.

summary.text: Housing Amendments - Extends, under the National Housing Act, from four years to four years and seven months, the period during which homeowners may apply for assistance in cases of structural defects in mortgaged homes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 518(a) of the National Housing Act for the purpose of extending the time period during which a homeowner may apply for assistance under such section.
